author: gameranx
description:
Fallout New Vegas is still going strong in 2025. Here's one of the best ways to play it on PC.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1

~~SOURCES~~

Viva New Vegas modpack - https://vivanewvegas.moddinglinked.com/

VerylastKiss's NEW NEW VEGAS MOD COLLECTION - https://www.nexusmods.com/games/newvegas/collections/jscbqj/mods



Nova Arizona mod - https://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/85915

trailer - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=im31_CFinr0

title: Fallout New Vegas in 2025 is A COMPLETELY DIFFERENT GAME
